Title: Chiave 2.1
Description:
Application for file encryption and decryption using 512 Bit Rijndael encryption algorithm with simple UI to use. Its written in C# and compiled in .Net version 3.5, it incorporates features of Windows 7 like Jumplists, Taskbar progress and Aero Glass.

Coming Soon
New Chiave 2 Sports new Look and Feel of Metro UI, 3x Faster and with a new Recovery Feature.
HomeWiki:
Chiave 2.1

Chiave 2.1 features new redesigned UI which sports Metro UI, Chromless and Simple. The speed is the main Concern in Chiave 1, which is improved and 3x faster in Chiave 2 Which also includes New History Panel and Recovery Key File system with all supported Windows 7 features.

Application for file encryption and decryption using 512 Bit rijndael encyrption algorithm with simple to use UI. Its written in C# and compiled in .Net version 3.5. It supports Windows XP, Vista and 7 (32-Bit and 64-Bit) , Windows Server 2003,2008 and 2008 R2(32-Bit and 64-Bit).

 

New Look of Chiave 2

  ﻿

System Requirments:

  • Windows XP,Vista, 7.
  •  .Net Framework version 2.0 for Windows XP (Download)
  • .Net Framework version 3.5(for Vista and Windows 7) (Download)
  • 128 MB system memory.
  •  4MB of hard disk free space.

Feedbacks are welcome! (Feedbacks, remarks, issues can be submitted via 'Send Feedback' in the app or mail to nsathya@live.in)
